put.mlc.experiments

Class GeneralExperiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • put.mlc.experiments.Experiment
      • put.mlc.experiments.GeneralExperiment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleExperiment, TunedExperiment

    public class GeneralExperiment
extends Experiment
    Implementation of the simple experiment when the learner with a base classifier is given.
    Author:
    Arkadiusz Jachnik
    See Also:
    Experiment}

        public ExperimentResult evaluation(java.lang.String trainSet,

        Runs experiment using the given multi-label learner.
        Specified by:
        evaluation in class Experiment
        Parameters:
        trainSet - name of ARFF file with the training set
        testSet - name of ARFF file with the testing set
        labelsXML - name of XML file with IDs of labels
        Returns:
        ExperimentResult object with results for each measure, training time and inference time

        java.lang.Exception
